doc.field: Series I - Leake and Watts Orphan House in the City of New York/Leake and Watts Children's Home, Inc.
Series I - Leake and Watts Orphan House in the City of New York/Leake and Watts Children's Home, Inc.
Leake and Watts Children's Home records
Leake and Watts Children's Home records

The series consists of two volumes and about 4 boxes of reports, arranged in the following order: I.2A - Annual Reports, 1916-1949 I.2B - Treasurer's Reports to the Board of Trustees, 1851-1914 I.2C - Auditor's Reports to the Board of Trustees, 1912-1949 I.2D - Superintendent's Reports to the Board of Trustees, 1844-1935 I.2E - Monthly Reports to NYC Department of Public Welfare, 1941-1947 I.2F - School Reports, 1844-1913 The collection of annual reports is incomplete. Most reports from the 1930's and 1940s are missing.
Leake and Watts Children's Home records
